annotations.div: * 1.1 μῆνιν : #character Achilles feels anger. #character Achilles feels pain. #character Achilles feels revenge. #narrator the_poet feels empathy. * 1.1 μῆνιν : #character Achilles feels anger. #character Achilles feels pain. #character Achilles feels revenge. #narrator the_poet feels empathy. * 1.2 οὐλομένην : #narrator the_poet feels disdain. * 1.2 ἄλγε’: #narrator the_poet feels empathy. #narrator thepoet feels sadness. * 1.3 ἰφθίμους ψυχὰς Ἄϊδι προΐαψεν : #annotator i feel sadness. * 1.4 ἑλώρια τεῦχε κύνεσσιν : #annotator i feel pain. #narrator the_poet feels pain. * 1.5 Διὸς δ’ ἐτελείετο βουλή : #narrator the_poet feels awareness. * 1.7 δῖος: #narrator the_poet feels admiration for Achilles.

* 1.11 ἠτίμασεν : #annotator i feel anger. * 1.15 χρυσέῳ ἀνὰ σκήπτρῳ : #annotator i feel admiration. * 1.15 λίσσετο : #annotator i feel mercy. #narrator the_poet feels mercy. * 1.17 ἐϋκνήμιδες : #annotator i feel admiration. #narrator the_poet feels admiration. * 1.20 παῖδα δ’ ἐμοὶ λύσαιτε φίλην: #chracter Chryses feels distress. #annotator i feel empathy. * 1.22 ἐπευφήμησαν : #annotator i feel awareness.

* 1.22 ἐπευφήμησαν : #annotator i feel awareness. #narrator the_poet feels awareness. * 1.25 κακῶς : #annotator i feel anger. #character Agamemnon feels fury. #character Agamemnon feels grudge. *1. 26 μή σε γέρον κοίλῃσιν ἐγὼ παρὰ νηυσὶ κιχείω : #character Agamemnon feels fury. * 1.28 μή νύ τοι οὐ χραίσμῃ σκῆπτρον καὶ στέμμα θεοῖο : #character Agamemnon feels impiety.
* 1.33 ἔδεισεν δ’ ὃ γέρων καὶ ἐπείθετο μύθῳ : #character Chryses feels humiliation. #annotator i feel sadness. * 1.32 ἴθι : #annotator i feel anger.
* 1.43 τοῦ δ’ ἔκλυε : #annotator i feel admiration. *1. 44 βῆ : #annotator i feel admiration.

* 1.51 πυραὶ νεκύων καίοντο : #annotator i feel sadness. #annotator i feel distress. #narrator the_poet feels distress. * 1.54 ἀγορὴν δὲ καλέσσατο λαὸν Ἀχιλλεύς : #annotator i feel respect for Achilles. #annotator i feel relief. * 1.55 θῆκε θεὰ λευκώλενος Ἥρη : #annotator i feel relief. * 1.56 κήδετο γὰρ Δαναῶν : #annotator i feel respect for Achilles.

* 1.65 λλ’ ἄγε δή τινα μάντιν ἐρείομεν ἢ ἱερῆα : #character Achilles feels question. * 1.67 βούλεται ἀντιάσας ἡμῖν ἀπὸ λοιγὸν ἀμῦναι : #character Achilles shows respect to Gods. *1.69 ὄχ’ ἄριστος: #annotator i feel admiration for Kalchas. #narrator the_poet feels admiration for Kalchas.
* 1.73 ἐὺ φρονέων : #annotator i feel confidence. *1.78 ἦ γὰρ ὀΐομαι ἄνδρα χολωσέμεν, ὃς μέγα πάντων : #annotator i feel awareness.
* 1.83 σὺ δὲ φράσαι εἴ με σαώσεις.: #annotator i feel empathy for Kalchas. * 1.89 οὔ...χεῖρας ἐποίσει : #annotator i feel confidence. #character Achilles feels bravery.
* 1.94 ἠτίμησ’ : #annotator i feel angry for Agamemnon. #narrator the_poet feels rejection.
* 1.103 ἀχνύμενος : #annoator i feel anger for Agamemnon. #narrator the_poet feels for Achilles. *1.107 κάκ’ : #character Agamemnon feels anger for kalchas.
* 1.118 ἑτοιμάσατ’ ὄφρα : #annotator i feel fury for agamemnon. * 1.119 Ἀργείων ἀγέραστος ἔω : #character Agamemnon feels jealousy. #character Agamemnon feels complaint.

* 1.121 ποδάρκης δῖος : #annoator i feel admiration for Achilles. #narrator feels pride for Achilles. * 1.122 φιλοκτεανώτατε : #character Achilles feels disdain for Agamemnon. *1.130 κρείων : #narrator the_poet feels respect for Agamemnon.

* 1.133 ὄφρ’ αὐτὸς ἔχῃς γέρας: #character Agamemnon feels jealousy. * 1.136 εἰ δέ κε μὴ δώωσιν ἐγὼ δέ₁ κεν αὐτὸς ἕλωμαι: #annotator i feel anger. #recipient the_ancient_audience feels anger. #recipient the_current_audience feels anger for Agamemnon. * 1.139 κεχολώσεται: #character Agamemnon feels acknowledgement. #recipient the_current_audience feels acknowledgement.

* 1.143 καλλιπάρῃον : #annotator i feel admiration for Chryseis.#narrator the_poet feels admiration. #recipient the_ancient_audience feels admiration. #recipient the_current_audience feels admiration. * 1.146 ἐκπαγλότατ’ : #recipient the_ancient_audience feels admiration for Achilles. #ecipient the_ancient_audience feels pride for Achilles. #recipient the_current_audience feels pride for Achilles. #recipient the_current-audience feels admiration for Achilles. #annotator i feel admiration for Achilles. #annotator i feel pride for Achilles. * 1.148 ὑπόδρα : #annotator i feel empathy for Achilles. #recipient the_ancient_audience feels empathy. #recipient the_current_audience feels awareness. * 1.148 ὠκὺς : #annotator i feel admiration for Achilles. #narrator the_poet feels admiration for Achilles.
* 1.152 οὐ Τρώων ἕνεκ’ : #annotator i feel acknowledgement.

* 1.166 χεῖρες ἐμαὶ : #annotator i feel acknowledgement. #recipient the_ancient_audience feels acknoledgement. * 1.169 εἶμι Φθίην : #annotator i feel empathy for Achilles.#narrator the_poet feels empathy for Achilles.

* 1.180 οὐκ ἀλεγίζω : #annotator i feel anger for Agamemnon. #recipient the_current_audience feels angeer for Agamemnon. #recipient the_ancient_audience feels anger for Agamemnon. #annotator i feel distress for Greeks.
* 1.188 ἄχος : #annotator i feel empathy for Achilles. #annotator i feel distress for Achilles.
* 1.191 ἐναρίζοι : #character Achilles feels anger. #annotator i feel anxiety. * 1.194 ἦλθε δ’₁Ἀθήνη οὐρανόθεν : #annotator i feel surprise.
* 1.209 ἄμφω ὁμῶς θυμῷ...1.210 μη δὲ ξίφος ἕλκεο χειρί· : #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_curent_audience, #annoator i feel confidence.

* 1.212 ὧδε γὰρ ἐξερέω... 1.213παρέσσεται ἀγλαὰ δῶρα : #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_curent_audience, #annotator i feel certainty. *1.216 εἰρύσσασθαι : #character Achilles feels self_denial. #character Achilles feels hope. *1.220 ἂψ δ’ ἐς κουλεὸν ὦσε μέγα ξίφος : #recipient the_ancient_audience, the_curent_audience, #annotator i feel relief.

* 1.225 οἰνοβαρές,... 1.228 θυμῷ : #character Achilles feels anger. #recipient the_current_audience, the_ancient_audience, #annotator i feel empathy. #recipient the_current_audience, the_ancient_audience, #annotator i feel awareness.
* 1.241 εὖτ’ ἂν... 1.243 πίπτωσι : #annotator i feel sadness.
* 1.254 ὦ πόποι... ἱκάνει: #character Nestor feels sadness. * 1.257 εἰ σφῶϊν τάδε πάντα πυθοίατο μαρναμένοιϊν : #annotator i feel anxiety. #recipient the_current_audience feels anxiety.
* 1.263 οἷον Πειρίθοόν τε... 1.265 ἀθανάτοισιν : #character Nestor feels pride.#annotator i feel admiration.

* 1.288 πάντων μὲν κρατέειν ἐθέλει, πάντεσσι δ’ ἀνάσσειν : #annotator i feel anger for Agamemnon. #recipient the_current_audience feels anger.#recipient the_ancient_audience feels anger for Agamemnon.
* 1.293 ἦ γάρ κεν δειλός ... 1.294 ὅττί κεν εἴπῃς : #annotator i feel empathy for Achilles.

*1.304 ὣς τώ γ’ ἀντιβίοισι ... 1.305 παρὰ νηυσὶν Ἀχαιῶν : #annotator i feel sadness for Greeks. #recipient the_ancient_audience feels sadness. #recipient the_current_audience feels sadness. #narrator the_poet feels sadness. #annotator i feel anxiety. #recipient the_ancient_audience feels anxiety. #recipient the_current_audience feels anxiety.
